valueFormat.notes: Button visual style variant. Use enum constants STYLES.* from component

commonMistakes.mistake: Using string literal 'SOLID' instead of constant value 'solid'
commonMistakes.impact: Validator fails, falls back to default

valueFormat.enumReference: TYPES.PRIMARY | TYPES.SUBTLE_PRIMARY | TYPES.SECONDARY | TYPES.DANGER | TYPES.WARNING | TYPES.SMART | TYPES.SUBTLE_SMART | TYPES.INVERSE
valueFormat.notes: Button color theme. Determines background/text colors based on styling

commonMistakes.impact: Validator fails, button shows as primary

valueFormat.notes: CRITICAL: iconSize is STRING not number. '24' not 24
Button text content. Shown when labelTextStatus=true

commonMistakes.fix: Always set labelText when using the button

valueFormat.objectShape: { label: string, value: any, disabled?: boolean, icon?: string }
valueFormat.notes: Creates dropdown menu when provided. Renders InButtonGroup component
valueFormat.typescript: Array<{ label: string; value: any; disabled?: boolean; icon?: string }>

commonMistakes.fix: Use array of objects with label and value properties

valueFormat.objectShape: { id: string, dynamicPosition: boolean, staticPosition: string, iconStatus: boolean, offset: { x: number, y: number }, preventXss: boolean }
valueFormat.default: { id: 'tooltip', dynamicPosition: false, staticPosition: 'top center', iconStatus: false, offset: { x: 4, y: 4 }, preventXss: false }
valueFormat.typescript: { id: string; dynamicPosition: boolean; staticPosition: string; iconStatus: boolean; offset: { x: number; y: number }; preventXss: boolean }

payloadTypes.notes: Returns the clicked option from buttonGroupOptions

click.useCase: Main button click handler. Payload varies based on buttonGroupOptions presence

clickIcon.useCase: Emitted when icon is clicked (requires iconClick=true)

exampleEnrichments.title: Basic Button
exampleEnrichments.code:
<template>
  <InButtonV2
    id="submit-btn"
    styling="solid"
    type="primary"
    size="default"
    label-text="Submit"
    @click="handleSubmit" />
</template>

<script>
import { InButtonV2 } from '@useinsider/design-system-vue';

export default {
  components: { InButtonV2 },
  methods: {
    handleSubmit() {
      console.log('Form submitted');
    }
  }
};
</script>

exampleEnrichments.title: Button with Icon and Loading State
exampleEnrichments.description: Button with left icon and loading indicator
exampleEnrichments.code:
<template>
  <InButtonV2
    id="save-btn"
    styling="solid"
    type="primary"
    left-icon="save"
    icon-size="24"
    label-text="Save Changes"
    :loading-status="isSaving"
    :disabled-status="isSaving"
    @click="handleSave" />
</template>

<script>
import { InButtonV2 } from '@useinsider/design-system-vue';

export default {
  components: { InButtonV2 },
  data() {
    return {
      isSaving: false
    };
  },
  methods: {
    async handleSave() {
      this.isSaving = true;
      try {
        await this.saveData();
        alert('Saved!');
      } finally {
        this.isSaving = false;
      }
    },
    async saveData() {
      return new Promise(resolve => setTimeout(resolve, 2000));
    }
  }
};
</script>

exampleEnrichments.title: Button Group with Dropdown
exampleEnrichments.code:
<template>
  <InButtonV2
    id="export-btn"
    styling="ghost"
    type="primary"
    left-icon="export"
    label-text="Export"
    :button-group-options="exportOptions"
    @click="handleExport" />
</template>

<script>
import { InButtonV2 } from '@useinsider/design-system-vue';

export default {
  components: { InButtonV2 },
  data() {
    return {
      exportOptions: [
        { label: 'Export as CSV', value: 'csv', icon: 'file-csv' },
        { label: 'Export as Excel', value: 'xlsx', icon: 'file-excel' },
        { label: 'Export as PDF', value: 'pdf', icon: 'file-pdf' }
      ]
    };
  },
  methods: {
    handleExport(payload) {
      if (payload?.value) {
        console.log('Exporting as:', payload.value);
        this.performExport(payload.value);
      }
    },
    performExport(format) {
      // Export logic
    }
  }
};
</script>

performanceNotes.impact: Dropdown menu re-creates on every render
performanceNotes.solution: Move buttonGroupOptions to data() or computed

accessibilityNotes.reason: Screen readers need descriptive button text

accessibilityNotes.requirement: Use disabledStatus instead of removing button
accessibilityNotes.reason: Disabled state maintains button in tab order with aria-disabled
